dct_description_sm: Klindworth's Verlag ; Gedruckt auf der lithographischen Schnelipresse in Klindworth's Hof-Druckerei.
Shows waterways, streets, railroads, vegetation, various buildings and points of interest.
Districts and different items on map distiginuished by coloring, with textual explanations of coloring in bottom margin.
Grid (A-H, 1-8) suggests map once belonged to book with index--possibly "Die königliche Residenzstadt Hannover : Führer und Plan," also published 1887 by Schmorl & von Seefeld.
